channel.title: Ryukyu Village is recruiting
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Ryukyu Village is recruiting"

item.title: Re: Ryukyu Village is recruiting
item.content:encoded: Hi Kagekiri! Its Me Sekai! I Didnt Know You Had A BVSWiki Acc! U Should Open A Char Page!

item.title: Re: Ryukyu Village is recruiting
item.content:encoded:
This is Kagekiri, Vice-Kage of Ryukyu (also Yubari, Kagekage of Kagegakure; also Tsuchigumo recently of Wiki Redux).

Ryukyu is again recruiting. We have a ton of upgrades, but due to a lot of villager inactivity… a number of them have been temporarily disabled! We've got Potion Palace, Jonin Council, etc, etc… all the normal draws and more then a few monster drop upgrades too… but our numbers have taken a hit.

We just need some warm bodies to get the village up to full-power again. Genin, Chunin, Special Jonin, Jonin… daily players, every other day players, even just weekly players… whatever… you name it… we're open to just about all comers.

item.title: Ryukyu Village is recruiting
item.content:encoded: Hey, our Kage said to start recruiting, and since there's not a thread here yet, I thought I'd post one.
